questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face off against a tyrannical Warlord of the Sea who manipulates strings. What is...?
Taking place on a unique island, this arc introduces the character of Chopper, a reindeer with the ability to transform. What is...?
Taking place on a ghostly island, this arc introduces a skeleton musician and features battles against zombie-like enemies. What is...?
This ability allows its user to swim through the ground as if it were water, used notably by a member of the Shichibukai. What is...?
This ability, used by a former Warlord of the Sea, allows the manipulation of shadows. What is...?
This technique, used by a Straw Hat crew member, involves transforming into a heavier, more powerful form. What is...?
This character, known for their Straw Hat, is the captain of the Straw Hat Pirates and dreams of becoming the Pirate King. Who is...?
This character, also known as 'Black Leg', is the Straw Hat Pirates' chef and a master of Black Leg Style martial arts. Who is...?
This new character, introduced in the Wano Country arc, is known for their claim to be the son of Kaido and for their mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit. Who is...?
